[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 00000000_00100000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   000_00000001_00000000
    FLOAT 01000000_00000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   010_00000000_00000000
    TFP   000_00000001_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00000000_00100000_00000000_00000000
    TFP   010_00000000_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 01000000_00000000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    000_00000001_00000000 + 010_00000000_00000000 = 010_00000000_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    000_00000001_00000000 * 010_00000000_00000000 = 000_00000010_00000000
